import React from 'react' import { Container, Navbar, Nav, LinkContainer, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import {NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Navigation = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin; return ( <> Shoppr
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile ) : Login }
) } export default Navigation
